subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Dominique Rodgers-Cromartie and Leodis McKelvin are the reasons Tennessee State and Troy could be called out early in April during the N.F.L. draft.
snippet: Dominique Rodgers-Cromartie and Leodis McKelvin are the reasons Tennessee State and Troy could be called out early in April during the N.F.L. draft.
